replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard objectives add tradeCount minecraft.custom:minecraft.traded_with_villager "交易次数"
scoreboard objectives add playTime minecraft.custom:minecraft.play_one_minute "在线时间"
scoreboard objectives add killCountDs dummy "钻剑击杀"
scoreboard objectives add killCountDs2 totalKillCount "钻剑击杀2"
scoreboard objectives add mineNr minecraft.mined:minecraft.netherrack "挖掘地狱岩"
scoreboard objectives add time dummy "轮换计时"

execute as @a[scores={killCountDs2=1..},nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword"}}] run scoreboard players add @s killCountDs 1
execute as @a[scores={killCountDs2=1..},nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword"}}] run scoreboard players reset @s killCountDs2

scoreboard players add $timer time 1
execute if score $timer time matches 1 run scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar tradeCount
execute if score $timer time matches 100 run scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar playTime
execute if score $timer time matches 200 run scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar killCountDs
execute if score $timer time matches 300 run scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar mineNr
execute if score $timer time matches 399 run scoreboard players set $timer time 0
